TEXT.TITLE: SWEDISH INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION FALLS IN JANUARY
TEXT.BODY: Sweden's industrial production fell 1.8 pct during January compared with a fall of 0.8 pct the month before and remains unchanged compared with January 1986, according to figures from the Central Bureau of Statistics. The bureau attributed the fall to a long Christmas break and particularly cold weather, which lowered production in the forestry industry. REUTER
